fields.title: Reading with Mrs Chelsea: Garden series 0 of 6
fields.details: We wil be in the garden for 2 hours reading about species of nightshades, if your kids are destructive please dont come. Check my events for more garden adventures

fields.title: Gardening: a scientific exploration expedition 1 of 6
fields.details: We wil be in the garden exploring for 2 hours discussing various species of nightshades, if your kids are destructive please dont come.

fields.title: Gardening: a scientific exploration expedition 2 of 6
fields.details: We wil be in the garden exploring for 2 hours discussing various species of nightshades, and learning about soil-prep to prepare for new seeds if your kids are destructive please come the last hour only.
